caption.paragraph:
Figure 4.
Magnispina neptunus
gen. et sp. nov.
Male holotype IBSP1502. A, left trochanter, femur and patella IV, dorsal view. B, right trochanter, femur and patella IV, ventral view. C, left trochanter, femur and patella IV, prolateral view. D, right trochanter, femur and patella IV, retrolateral view. Scale bars = 1 mm.

Pseudopucrolia incerta
comb. nov.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: BRAZIL . Espírito Santo , Bahia , Sergipe , Paraíba , Pernambuco , and Ceará . WWF Ecoregions: NT0103, NT0104, NT0106, NT0151, NT0152, respectively, Bahia coastal forests, Bahia interior forests, Caatinga Enclaves moist forests, Pernambuco coastal forests and Pernambuco interior forests. There is a record of distribution of the genus in Colombia (!) in an identification key ( Mello-Leitão, 1926: 330 ). This is doubtless a mistake.

Type species:
Pseudopucrolia spinosa Roewer, 1912
, by monotypy.
